website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few concerns, if you want face-flattering sunglasses with an adjustable fit, chances are you will like the way these sunglasses feel and look.
pros: Lightweight feel and adjustable nose pads help to ensure a perfect fit
Polarized lenses and attractive, sturdy frames
cons: Wearers may occasionally notice slight glare under some  conditions
Stems aren't as flexible as others we considered

customer_reviews.title: Will Be Returned
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three pair of Maui Jims. This style was unacceptable to me. They are super light weight, even cheaper feeling than bargain rack sunglasses from Walmart. They arrived in a plastic bag with dirty lenses. The other two styles are made in Italy, but this one was made in Japan. That would not matter if they were of good quality. For a $200 pair of sunglasses, they felt like about $5.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in quality of frames
customer_reviews.text: I consider myself a dedicated customer of Maui Jim sunglasses. I’ve been wearing this brand for near 10 years. I am returning the glasses due to the cheap and lightweight feeling of the frames. Maybe these are intended to feel this way but if I keep these I know I they will snap and break. I am pretty rough on my sunglasses and even my husband encouraged me to return. The lenses did not disappoint... just the frames.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta

customer_reviews.title: Felt Cheaply maid
customer_reviews.text: I've had a pair of Maui Jim's for several years and loved them! Thought I found similar pair so bought them. When the arrived, they were not the pair I thought they were (that's on me" but tried them on once and then repackaged and sent back. These glasses were not strong and durable like my old ones. These were thin, light, and felt cheaply made for the $198.00 I spent on them. Very disappointed. Having said that, the company was amazing with their return policy and directions. The courier came to my door to pick up the package.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: I got these last Friday and used them yesterday for the first time at the beach. I didn't had to cringe all day because of the sun. These are very lightweight and comfortable, I didn't even notice I had them on all day. Yes they are very expensive but are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Kcrafty

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Love these sunglasses! I have had another pair of Maui Jims for years and the maui rose lenses are my favorite. I can't wear anything else! Not too dark and everything looks clear and bright. These frames are super lightweight and comfortable to wear and I love the subtle purple color. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: K. N.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small face!
customer_reviews.text: And they stay where you put them. Nose pads are adjustable and they stay off my cheeks allowing air around them so no sweat buildup.
customer_reviews.author: LuvLeigh01

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: I like my sunglasses, but I think that their price exceeds their value. They are very light weight, attractive and accomplish the desired intent- stylish sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and dark lenses.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite Mauii Jim's so far. This is my 3rd pair. They're light weight. Excellent nose piece. Won't slide down your nose. Very light weight. Just the right amount of tint for bright sunny days.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Spot's mom

customer_reviews.title: FAKE imposters
customer_reviews.text: Do not order these. They are not real Maui Jim's. More like Robert Hawaii.
customer_reviews.author: PrimePro

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable clarity
customer_reviews.text: I got these on sale from Amazon warehouse and they arrived in perfect condition. you can’t beat Maui Jim’s the clarity of the lenses is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: tanya P

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Lenses pop out easily. Worth maybe $30, not over $200.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 4 pairs the arm always comes apart Too much money for a product that only last for 1 year
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are very flimsy. I have owned 2 other pair of Maui Jim glasses and the frames werw very sturdy as these seem to be made cheaper than my dollar store glasses.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Superior sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the weight of the frames and the fit. The lenses are the best optics.
customer_reviews.author: Jky

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and look great
customer_reviews.text: I tried these sunglasses on in a store and purchased them with my Prime membership. They look great and are extremely comfortable due to the light weight and rubber on the nose piece. They're polarized which I always need, but I do find myself squinting a little in bright son.
customer_reviews.author: Laura B

customer_reviews.title: Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Love the clarity and glare free vision with the very light weight of the product
customer_reviews.author: marcia kelley

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, stylish, use for beach or city
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are so comfortable- this is my third pair. The shape works well on my round face, but I think it’s great for all faces.
customer_reviews.author: FPruk

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Maui Jim's!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and a great tint to keep me from squinting! I usually prefer heavier weighted sunglasses, but these are terrific!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Grady

customer_reviews.title: Love, but not for me
customer_reviews.text: I love these, but had to return them. They hit my cheeks and move when I talk or smile. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: randy's opinion

customer_reviews.title: Light and dark
customer_reviews.text: While these are very pricey, the quality can not be understated. The frame is extremely light and the lenses are extremely dark. Exactly what my wife wanted. She can wear them all day in the Texas sun without any discomfort or marks on her face. Definitely a new fan of Maui Jim
customer_reviews.author: Joe Morales

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The wife like them so that's all that matters. Kind of pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Like no other
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, comfortable for long wear, love the subtle purple pattern
customer_reviews.author: steph182

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: My 3rd pair of Maui Jim. These are very light and comfortable. Arrived quickly and in pristine condition.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these sunglasses! I have several other pairs of Maui Jims, but these are the best--so lightweight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Linda R. Berg

customer_reviews.title: Second pair in the same box as first
customer_reviews.text: I also returned a second pair for $279.00 in the same box as these. I hope my return is recorded for the second pair, too.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Krutzfeldt

customer_reviews.title: ... my Kiki Beach as well as how lightweight and comfortable they are
customer_reviews.text: Bought my first pair of Maui Jim and am loving the look of my Kiki Beach as well as how lightweight and comfortable they are. Can see out of them so well. Very Happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY, & EFFICIENCY
customer_reviews.text: Liked product...👍 Did not like missing cleaning cloth. NOT INCLUDED....😣👎
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: Love these Maui Jim's. A good size for a medium to small face.
customer_reviews.author: ESR

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are lightweight and comfortable but don't neutralize glare. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Lin F

customer_reviews.title: Love My Maui Jim’s
customer_reviews.text: Great for the beach! Not good for driving..... blind spots are terrible.
customer_reviews.author: tammy m garza

customer_reviews.title: Drug store quality sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: So flimsy I returned them. Felt like $9.99 sunglasses from Walgreens
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer 777

customer_reviews.title: The perfect sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Best sun glasses I have ever purchased and I have purchased many through the years. Beautiful clarity and everything looks beautiful. It is so light and comfortable to wear, leaves no dents on the nose. The nose pads are on wires and adjustable to customize the fit. I have ordered another.
customer_reviews.author: ShopTYD

customer_reviews.title: Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They are so lightweight that you can barely tell you have them on!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shape
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair of MJ's I have owed and they are by far the lightest of all. My only criticism would be that they don't come in all the MJ lens shades as I would have preferred them darker.
customer_reviews.author: Aren Clark

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair of Maui Jims
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to replace an old pair. They are a very good fit and I like that I can adjust the nose pad thing. This pair seems more dainty and maybe lacking quality a bit - I will let you know how they work out. (Paid $221)
customer_reviews.author: Heidi H.

product_meta.title: Maui Jim Women's Koki Beach Cat-Eye Sunglasses
product_meta.description: Looking for Manchester United Koki Beach? Click HereKoki Beach's colorful sands, located on Maui's east shore along the road to Hana, are the inspiration behind the many colorways their namesake frames are available in. These fashion sunglasses from Maui Jim come with polarized lenses that provide a clear, glare-free view.
feature_bullets: Click the Maui Jim link above to visit our brand store, where you can find our entire catalog of sunglasses
All Maui Jim sunglasses feature PolarizedPlus2 lens technology that go beyond shielding your eyes from glare and harmful UV rays by enhancing colors to reveal the true beauty of the world around you
Enjoy ultimate UV protection combined with premium style, incredible durability, glare-free vision, and color-boosting patented technologies
Maui Rose lenses provide a soothing rose tone and are excellent for full sun to overcast light conditions
Lenses made with MauiPure material for crisp optics and excellent shatter & scratch resistance
